summary:
Requests MONUC to review its efforts to prevent and respond to sexual violence, and to develop a comprehensive strategy to strengthen prevention, protection and response.

Encourages MONUC to enhance interaction with the civilian population and raise awareness about its mandate and activities.

Takes note of benchmarks for a future drawdown of MONUC and requests the Secretary-General to report regularly on progress.

Requests the Secretary-General to report regularly on the situation in the Democratic Republic of the Congo and MONUC's activities.

Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
